attributes.action: Re Open Lawmac Sports and reduce the costs for the benifit of the community!
attributes.background: The only indoor sports facility in skelmersdale with its prime users being disabled adults and young children, the unit has been closed down by the local council due to a disbute about money. Those who are currently using the facilty are devestated, this is a big loss to the local community!!

rejection.details:
This seems to be a local issue involving your council. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If there is something that the UK Government or Parliament could do, you could start a new petition asking specifically for that action.
